column5: done in Vue d'Esprit and Bryce            enjoy as desktop WP if you want  Paul
Speechless here.
Beautiful!!!!!
Very very nice indeed !!  Some serious talent for sure.
wow
Me like.      Me would buy too.
Uh ... WOW
What program do you use to generate this  i LOVE the 4th one with the water and the reeds.
You have some tallent man.  Those are very well done!
very nice!!
He said he used Vue d'esprit and Bryce.  Very nice Paul.
Really cool Mercman...Soon us old painters will be gone with the dinosaurs when you can produce work like this.
But can you paint a ceiling? great work Mercman
Ya'll mean like Michaelangelo??
most of them are done in Vue d'Esprit. I like the hd realism in the finished product. Some are in Bryce. i post process my images in photoshop or photoimpact.
NO WAY !!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i envy those who can do this by hand. Nothing beats oil, or pastels, or pencil. My only talent is my imagination and the ability to manipulate pixels.
Nice work....but now everyone is going to be fishing that spot!!
Nice! I like the first and fourth one.
Thanks for the offer.....I grabbed "sunset in the pines".....beautiful, the sun is so bright I can't actually look directly in to it.  Great work.  Dan
Sorry, i literally thought he was referring to a location where these images derived from. Thought it was a french canadian thing
